summary: My personal encounter zones modification, designed for Morrowloot Ultimate
descriptionHtml:
In Skyrim, an encounter zone is the minimum and maximum level between which enemies will scale to your player. So if an encounter zone has a minimum level of 20, a character that is level 6 will be treated as a level 20.
The vanilla game makes limited use of this, and usually the encounter zones are far too low in level to

This is simply my personal encounter zone modification that is tailored to my preference, it is designed for Morrowloot Ultimate and is heavily based off of permazones.

Morrowloot comes with its own encounter zones (also based off of permazones) so you should open all 3 mods (this, morrowloot, and permazones) in tes5edit to compare and see which one you prefer.
I haven't seen too many other encounter zone mods, so I decided to upload mine. Maybe someone will prefer it.

Generally speaking, this mod is a happy medium in between vanilla and permazones.

High Level Enemies is highly recommended for this sort of mod, simply to make sure that there are higher level variants of enemies to
pull from (and thankfully, with this encounter zone mod, you will only see the high level variants in high-level areas, so no level 90
bandits in riverwood)
Encounter Zones Unlocked is a must if you want to install this sort of mod mid-game, and is good to have either way.
author: Grushnag
